title: Creamy turkey stew in the slow cooker
ingredients: ['1 large skinless turkey breast fillet, cut into cubes', '5 medium red potatoes, quartered', '3 carrots, peeled and chopped', '3 sticks chopped celery', '2 (295g) tins condensed cream of chicken soup', '2 chicken stock cubes', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'freshly ground pepper, to taste', '200g frozen mixed vegetables']
